sentences: Art Van Damme (April 9, 1920 â€“ February 15, 2010) was an American jazz accordionist.
Van Damme toured Europe and was popular with jazz enthusiasts in Japan.
After he retired to Roseville, California, he continued to perform almost to the end of his life.
He had been ill with pneumonia for several weeks when he died on February 15, 2010 aged 89.
